dense_to_sparse.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #pragma once
2 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_DENSETOSPARSE_H__INCLUDED
3 #define TILEDARRAY_DENSETOSPARSE_H__INCLUDED
4 
5 #include "../dist_array.h"
6 
7 namespace TiledArray {
8 
10 
14 template <typename Tile, typename ResultPolicy = SparsePolicy,
15  typename ArgPolicy>
16 std::enable_if_t<!is_dense_v<ResultPolicy> && is_dense_v<ArgPolicy>,
17  DistArray<Tile, ResultPolicy>>
18 to_sparse(DistArray<Tile, ArgPolicy> const &dense_array) {
19  typedef DistArray<Tile, ResultPolicy> ArrayType; // return type
20  using ShapeType = typename ResultPolicy::shape_type;
21  using ShapeValueType = typename ShapeType::value_type;
22 
23  // Constructing a tensor to hold the norm of each tile in the Dense Array
24  TiledArray::Tensor<ShapeValueType> tile_norms(
25  dense_array.trange().tiles_range(), 0.0);
26 
27  const auto end = dense_array.end();
28  const auto begin = dense_array.begin();
29  for (auto it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
30  // write the norm of each local tile to the tensor
31  norm(it->get(), tile_norms[it.ordinal()]);
32  }
33 
34  // Construct a sparse shape the constructor will handle communicating the
35  // norms of the local tiles to the other nodes
36  ShapeType shape(dense_array.world(), tile_norms, dense_array.trange());
37 
38  ArrayType sparse_array(dense_array.world(), dense_array.trange(), shape);
39 
40  // Loop over the local dense tiles and if that tile is in the
41  // sparse_array set the sparse array tile with a clone so as not to hold
42  // a pointer to the original tile.
43  for (auto it = begin; it != end; ++it) {
44  const auto ord = it.ordinal();
45  if (!sparse_array.is_zero(ord)) {
46  sparse_array.set(ord, it->get().clone());
47  }
48  }
49 
50  return sparse_array;
51 }
52 
54 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
55 std::enable_if_t<!is_dense_v<Policy>, DistArray<Tile, Policy>> to_sparse(
56  DistArray<Tile, Policy> const &sparse_array) {
57  return sparse_array;
58 }
59 
60 } // namespace TiledArray
61 
62 #endif /* end of include guard: TILEDARRAY_DENSETOSPARSE_H__INCLUDED */
